DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Total Budget Spent Per Year
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#ebebeb","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":13,"WidgetRows":17,"WidgetColumns":25,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  v.EstimateName,
        sum(v.ActualBudget) as ActualBudget,
        sum(v.FutureBudget) as FutureBudget
from (
    select  replace(e.[Name], Year(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), '') as EstimateName,       
            sum(e.ValueWithVatCost) as ActualBudget,
            0 as FutureBudget
    from    Analytics.DatamartEstimate e
    where   e.Project = 'tools' and
            e.Department in ('Operations') and
            Year(e.Expiration) = Year(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
    group by e.[Name]
    union all
    select  replace(e.[Name], 
            Year(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) + 1, '') as EstimateName,
            0 as ActualBudget,
            sum(e.ValueWithVatCost) as FutureBudget
    from    Analytics.DatamartEstimate e
    where   e.Project = 'tools' and
            e.Department in ('Operations') and
            Year(e.Expiration) = Year(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) + 1
    group by e.[Name]
) v
group by v.EstimateName
order by v.EstimateName asc","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Total Budgets
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:

from (

            0 as FutureBudget
    from    Analytics.DatamartEstimate e
    where   e.Project = 'tools' and

    group by e.[Name]
    union all
    select  replace(e.[Name], 
            Year(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) + 1, '') as EstimateName,
            0 as ActualBudget,
            sum(e.ValueWithVatCost) as FutureBudget
    from    Analytics.DatamartEstimate e
    where   e.Project = 'tools' and
            e.Department in ('Operations') and
            Year(e.Expiration) = Year(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) + 1
    group by e.[Name]
) v
group by v.EstimateName
order by v.EstimateName asc","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]
